channel.title: Tribute to the Half Life Beta (ie: Space Bikers and freaky looking security guards)
channel.description:
Ok,most of you know of the old ALPHA (Beta?) screenshots published for Half Life before it became what it is today.
For example, Gordon's very very bearded appearence. Or Barney's almost skeletal facial features. Need less to say, they had a much more comic based appearence than today. But still, would it not be fun to have a category of scientist and Securit Guard featuring facs resembling thoce of the BETA designs?
In case you do not have the pics in hand, I can post them here:
Security Guard1: ![](upload://nIQzkJXXjIN3uCpD503IZn7CVe8.jpeg)
Security Guard2: ![](upload://kHVDeckUmwOiMD15bZDwkMgKjxF.jpeg)
Security Guard3: ![](upload://krN7ywgw7OeAAxvjNG145cQYfkJ.png)
And some that was used in Opposing Force:
Otis1: ![](upload://jP53Ifl4U8o3yUj1TEq69OQfdjf.jpeg)
Otis2: ![](upload://ajcsmfBjOHXMbhikJGDG86MwczG.jpeg)
Otis3: ![](upload://v9h8Gzw4DHcqUm8Pek48osuBcUT.jpeg)
And finally..... Erhum Ivan the Space Biker: [img]https://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/half-life/en/images/8/80/Doctor_model_views.jpg[/img]

item.title: Tribute to the Half Life Beta (ie: Space Bikers and freaky looking security guards)
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Why the hell is it that every post I see of Danny Smith is either incredibly late, retarded, or both?

And while I’m sure its too late to get back on topic, I still feel I must say that, um, I don’t want to wait an extra week or more from release just for some easteregg Ivan the Space Biker.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
Ibanez:

https://www.valvesoftware.com/

Valve Corporation:

January 29, 2010 — Valve® today announced extraordinary 2009 growth data for Steam, a leading platform for PC games and digital entertainment, with major increases in accounts, concurrent players, unit sales and more. The year also marked tremendous adoption of the Steamworks suite of publishing services in the tangible and electronic versions of many of the year’s biggest releases.

Valve Corporation:

About Valve®

Valve Corporation:

Valve®

:hmph:

Read full topic

item.title: Tribute to the Half Life Beta (ie: Space Bikers and freaky looking security guards)
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
DoctorWeeTodd:

Thankfully VALVe kept a wealth of the cut content within the game files. That includes dozens of completed functioning monsters like Mister Friendly and the Kingpin as well as Ivan the Space Biker.

What are you talking about? How does a few unfinished NPC models and an unanimated player model make a “completed functioning” NPC? There is no code, no sounds, and next to no animations.

Read full topic
